text:
class: org.apache.taglibs.standard.tag.common.core.ParamSupport
method: doEndTag()

This method uses deprecated URLEncoder.encode(value):

parent.addParameter(URLEncoder.encode(name), URLEncoder.encode(value));

which uses deafult system encoding, which can be different from page encoding.
This leads to incorrect encoding of URL string.
creator: jakarta@tomucha.cz

text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 16912 ***
creator: pierre.delisle@sun.com
